title: Favorite LEVEL
content:
Sorry if this has been done before [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] ...but what is your very fave level of ALL the games?? I LOVE Cave of the Descendants.---
*I'm Kristen, I'm 16 and I'm a Bloogoholic*
[img]http://tinypic.com/feihsg.jpg[/img]
My "favorite enemies" from the Keen games

title: hmm.
content:
Oh, man, that's a good question. Much to LevelLord's delight, I like the Russian-themed Keen2 level most. Moscow!

http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k2-lvl15.html

I like this level mostly because of the "puzzle" involving getting the red and yellow keycards. I felt so very smart back when I was 11, figuring out how to do that. :-)

Looking at it now, a decade later, I still enjoy it because of the way things are place throughout the level... it's a good mix of "optional but deadly points" and "passages which aren't long enough to be LHS but are very simple nonetheless." It's also got a secret after the exit which I appreciate.

Ironically, my favorite Keen2 level doesn't have a single Scrub in it. :-)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: hmm.
content:
Yeah, that's a nice level, gotta agree.

Hmmm, it's hard to pick a favourite, really.. Perhaps something Keen 4 level, although that's not necessarily my favourite Keen game. I guess it'd be Sand Yego:
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k4-lvl08.html]www.classicgaming.com/cc3...lvl08.html[/url]
That level just has some good feeling in it, and nicely arachnuts when playing hard. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: hmm.
content:
Definitely that Keen 2 level, followed closely by the neutrino burst generator in Keen 5.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: Re: Favorite LEVEL
content: Hmm... It's a hard question. I would probably say that my favorite level is the Pyramid of the Forbidden. I'm not sure, though. Well, Cave of Descendents and Isle of Fire are nice levels too. I like many other levels from the other Keen games, but I can't remember their names. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

title: Re: OT: Forbidden
content:
The pyramid of the forbidden, certainly.

It's secret to get to [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-disguised.gif[/img] , hard [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] and has anticlimatic dissapointment at the end. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

then the keen1 castle: I wasted all my ammo on the vortican, and when I finnally figured it out I had to do it again because I had no more ammo... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

then the secret lvl in keen1, tons of yorps [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

- (Just a thought, but why don't we have more options in polls?) -

my next choice than would be the pyramid of the gnosticene ancients: lots of treasure, and treasure eaters! (i hate it when they take the keygem though...)

title: Re: OT: Forbidden
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Keygem!!!

I hate it when they take the lives... I mean, am I the only one here who challeges himself to beat Keen without cheats? [hr][/quote]

yes, I do hate it when they take the lives, but I generally save anyway, so whenever I lose a life I just redo the level (or section of the level) where I died, with nil loss.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Since when they steal keygems? [hr][/quote]

there was a keygem required to open the door just before the orace chamer - at times I forget to get the keygem first, and when I come to get it, it's gone (stolen)

lives are very useful, but the keygem is essential if you want to complete the level (there is a member there) without cheating.

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/signat.jpg[/img]

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars

title: Re: OT: Forbidden
content:
I can't say which levels from ALL games are best. I don't like Keens 1-3 at all because they have very old graphics. I think that All levels from Keens 4-6 are good but the best are:


From Keen 4:
Miragia
Islre of Tar
Isle of Fire
Lifewater oasis
Cave of the Descedent
All pyramids

From Keen 5:
Brownian motion Inducer
Korath III base
Energy flow systems
Gravitional Damping Hub
QED

From Keen 6:
Blogfoous, inc.
Bloogton Manufacturing
Bloogton Towr
Level 11
Bloogville
All levels outside the "Earth"

Espicially i like objects, which occurs rare in original levels (for example, Pouner and Flame in keen 6)

[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]
